member.summary: An implementation of DataAttribute that composes other DataAttribute instances.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ploeh.AutoFixture.Xunit.CompositeDataAttribute.GetData(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Type[])
member.summary: Returns the composition of data to be used to test the theory. Favors the data returned by DataAttributes in ascending order. Data already returned is ignored on next DataAttribute returned data.
member.param: The method that is being tested.
The types of the parameters for the test method.
member.returns: Returns the composition of the theory data.
member.remarks: The number of test cases is set from the first DataAttribute theory length.
